description: Designed and analyzed a Docker web app using ExpressJS, PostgreSQL, Bootstrap 4, HTML/CSS, and Handlebars, showcasing my skills in web development and design.
Demonstrated proficiency in Docker and its automation capabilities, allowing for task automation and optimized workflow.
Collaborated effectively with team members to identify and solve problems.
I worked with PostgreSQL, ExpressJS, JavaScript, and Gitlab CI as a backend developer, demonstrating my proficiency in these technologies.
Successfully implemented the Authentication module for an ECommerce website, improving the security of the website.
Engaged in system analysis and design, contributing to the development of the software.
Conducted a Proof of Concept for full-text search in PostgreSQL, showcasing my problem-solving skills and ability to identify and evaluate potential solutions.
Utilized MongoDB, NestJS, ExpressJS, Docker, Nginx, and Gitlab CI as a skilled Backend Engineer.
Developed a matchmaking system, which relieved the sales team of a tedious task, resulting in increased productivity.
Significantly improved code quality and readability by refactoring the entire backend application from JavaScript to TypeScript. Contributed approximately 40% of the overall refactor effort.
Utilized NestJS, PostgreSQL, Nginx, and Docker in my role as a backend developer, showcasing my proficiency in these technologies.
Successfully configured an Ubuntu server and Nginx, enabling smooth deployment and maintenance of web applications.
Developed a custom module that acted as an API wrapper for Partocrs, making it easier for us to work with Partocrs.
Utilized Ansible to configure servers and improving overall efficiency.
Developed a ticketing system that improved communication and workflow between customers and customer management department, resulting in a more productive and organized work environment.
Designed and prototyped a web application for apartment booking, showcasing exceptional problem-solving skills and demonstrating expertise in software engineering.
I worked with NestJS, React, Typescript, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Keycloak, Terraform, and Docker.
As the security champion for my team, I took ownership of ensuring the safety of our software.
I demonstrated a proactive approach to taking responsibility and was always willing to go above and beyond to ensure project success.
I successfully implemented Test-Driven Development (TDD) in both frontend and backend.
I regularly shared my in-depth knowledge of MongoDB with my team, providing valuable insights and helping to improve their understanding and use of the database technology.
